remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个绑定通常具有以下四个组件: 绑定目标对象、目标属性、绑定源和绑定源中要使用的值的路径。Each binding typically has these four components: a binding target object, a target property, a binding source, and a path to the value in the binding source to use. 有关这些数据绑定概念的详细信息, 请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information about these data binding concepts, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 使用属性指定要绑定到的源值:Use the property to specify the source value you want to bind to: - 在最简单的情况下 , 属性值是要用于绑定的源对象的属性的名称, `Path=PropertyName`例如。In the simplest case, the property value is the name of the property of the source object to use for the binding, such as `Path=PropertyName`. - 可以通过类似于中C#使用的语法来指定属性的子属性。Subproperties of a property can be specified by a syntax similar to that used in C#. 例如，子句 `Path=ShoppingCart.Order` 设置与对象或属性 `ShoppingCart` 的子属性 `Order` 的绑定。For instance, the clause `Path=ShoppingCart.Order` sets the binding to the subproperty `Order` of the object or property `ShoppingCart`. - 若要绑定到附加属性，请将附加属性置于括号中。To bind to an attached property, place parentheses around the attached property. 例如, 若要绑定到附加属性, 语法为。 `Path=(DockPanel.Dock)`For example, to bind to the attached property , the syntax is `Path=(DockPanel.Dock)`. - 可以在已应用索引器的属性名后面的方括号内指定属性的索引器。Indexers of a property can be specified within square brackets following the property name where the indexer is applied. 例如，子句 `Path=ShoppingCart[0]` 将绑定设置为与属性的内部索引处理文本字符串“0”的方式对应的索引。For instance, the clause `Path=ShoppingCart[0]` sets the binding to the index that corresponds to how your property's internal indexing handles the literal string "0". 还支持多个索引器。Multiple indexers are also supported. - 可以在 `Path` 子句中混用索引器和子属性，例如 `Path=ShoppingCart.ShippingInfo[MailingAddress,Street].`Indexers and subproperties can be mixed in a `Path` clause; for example, `Path=ShoppingCart.ShippingInfo[MailingAddress,Street].` - 可以在索引器内使用多个由逗号 (,) 分隔的索引器参数。Inside indexers you can have multiple indexer parameters separated by commas (,). 可以使用括号指定每个参数的类型。The type of each parameter can be specified with parentheses. 例如，可以使用 `Path="[(sys:Int32)42,(sys:Int32)24]"`，其中 `sys` 将映射到 `System` 命名空间。For example, you can have `Path="[(sys:Int32)42,(sys:Int32)24]"`, where `sys` is mapped to the `System` namespace. - 如果源是集合视图，则可以使用斜杠 (/) 指定当前项。When the source is a collection view, the current item can be specified with a slash (/). 例如，子句 `Path=/` 设置与视图中当前项的绑定。For example, the clause `Path=/` sets the binding to the current item in the view. 如果源是集合，则此语法指定默认集合视图的当前项。When the source is a collection, this syntax specifies the current item of the default collection view. - 可以组合使用属性名和斜杠，以遍历作为集合的属性。Property names and slashes can be combined to traverse properties that are collections. 例如，`Path=/Offices/ManagerName` 指定源集合的当前项，源集合中包含的 `Offices` 属性也是一个集合。For example, `Path=/Offices/ManagerName` specifies the current item of the source collection, which contains an `Offices` property that is also a collection. 它的当前项是一个包含 `ManagerName` 属性的对象。Its current item is an object that contains a `ManagerName` property. - 句点 (.) 路径也可以用于绑定到当前源。Optionally, a period (.) path can be used to bind to the current source. 例如，`Text="{Binding}"` 与 `Text="{Binding Path=.}"` 等效。For example, `Text="{Binding}"` is equivalent to `Text="{Binding Path=.}"`. 有关路径语法的信息, 请参阅[绑定声明概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-declarations-overview.md)或[PropertyPath XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md)。For information about path syntax, see [Binding Declarations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-declarations-overview.md) or [PropertyPath XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md). 对于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]绑定, 请参见属性。For [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] bindings, see the property. 若要绑定到整个对象, 无需指定属性。To bind to an entire object, you do not need to specify the property. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)中的 "指定值的路径"。For more information, see "Specifying the Path to the Value" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个创建的、用于报告验证错误消息的样式触发器。The following example shows a style trigger that creates a that reports a validation error message.
